page.info.title: Xp Storage Info
handbook.main.text: XP Obelisk Mod introduces a safe method to store experience points inside a spiritual cage. Normally the XP points will only linger around the ground for a minute then disappear forever or get destroyed when the player die's. With XP Obelisk, players’ can safe store more than 21,863 level's.
handbook.categories.block: Learn more about the Xp Storage block's
page.text.xp_storage: The Core Block that's stores the Experience
page.text.xp_berries: XP Berries can be used on XP Storage to insert some Experience.$(br)XP Berries can always be eaten. If you sneak while eat they drop the XP-Orbs to repair items with Mending.
page.text.bottle_o_enchant: Use a Empty Bottle on XP Storage to fill it or Emptying on the XP Storage.
handbook.categories.item: Learn more about the Xp Storage Item's!
handbook.categories.info: Learn more about the Xp Storage system!
page.text.xp_remover: The XP Transfer is used to Transfer Experience to the XP Storage. $(br2)$(l)Note:$() If you have x Xp Transfer Items in Hand you will Transfer xLevel's instead of 1Level.$(br2)Switch Mode's with Sneak Right-Click
page.text.inspector: The Inspector is used to show detailed information about the XP Storage.$(br)$(li)Owner$(li)Stored XP$(li)Fill level$(li)Player XP
page.text.key: The Key is used to Unlock the XP Storage
page.text.lock: The Lock is used to lock the XP Storage. $(br2)$(l)Note:$() If the XP Storage is Locked Fluid extraction is disabled
page.text.xp_berrie_seeds: XP Berrie Seeds are used to generate Peaceful Experience.$(br2)Can be Planted on:
page.text.bucket: Use a Empty Bucket on XP Storage to fill it or Emptying on the XP Storage.
page.text.info.description: The XP Storage is made out of Magical Soulcopper.$(br)After you place it, you can put Experience in and out with the Transceiver or Fluid Interface's.$(br2)$(l)Note:$() If you hold more than 1 item the transfer rate act accordingly.
page.text.info.usages.title: XP Storage Interactions
page.text.info.usages.text: You can use Bottle's or Bucket's on the XP Storage to insert or extract Experience.$(br2)You can use Damaged Items with $(l)Mending Enchantment$() on the XP Storage to Repair the Item with the stored Experience.
page.text.info.mending.heading: Item Repair with XP
page.text.info.vacuum.heading: XP Storage Vacuum
page.text.info.vacuum.text: Use on XP Storage to Toggle Vacuum Mode
page.text.info.vacuum.detail: The Glass Block's Represent the Vacuum Range. 9x5x9 Blocks
item.tooltip.inspector: Use on XP Storage to inspect it.
item.tooltip.xp_rod: Use on XP Storage to receive level.
item.tooltip.xp_remover: Use on XP Storage to store level.
item.tooltip.xp_berrie_sneak: Sneak eat to drop XP on ground
item.tooltip.lock: Use on XP Storage to lock it.
item.tooltip.key: Use on XP Storage to unlock it.
xps.advancements.xp_obelisk.title: Storage To Infinity
